titles.toggle-between-the-director-control-room: Passa dalla visualizzazione della sala di controllo della regia alla modalità di anteprima della scena.
titles.stream-a-media-file: Trasmettere in streaming un file multimediale
titles.hold-ctrl-or-cmd-to-select-multiple-file: Tieni premuto CTRL (or CMD) per selezionare più file
titles.blind-all-guests-in-room-toggle-: Blocca  tutti gli ospiti nella stanza (toggle)

titles.hold-ctrl-or-cmd-and-click-to-spotlight-: Premi CTRL (or CMD)  e clicca per vedere questo video
titles.obs-remote-controller-start-stop-and-cha: OBS Remote Controller; start/stop e cambiare scene.
titles.alert-the-host-you-want-to-speak: Avvisa l'ospite con cui vuoi parlare
titles.record-your-stream-to-disk: Registra il tuo stream su disco

titles.if-disabled-the-invited-guest-will-not-b: Se l'ospite è disabilitato, non sarà in grado di vedere o sentire nessuno nella stanza.
titles.use-this-link-in-the-obs-browser-source-: Utilizzare questo collegamento nella sorgente del browser OBS per acquisire il video o l'audio
titles.if-disabled-you-must-manually-add-a-vide: Se è disattivato, è necessario aggiungere manualmente un video a una scena perché venga visualizzato.
titles.disables-echo-cancellation-and-improves-: Disattiva la cancellazione dell'eco e migliora la qualità dell'audio
titles.audio-only-sources-are-visually-hidden-f: Le sorgenti audio sono nascoste visivamente dalle scene
titles.allow-for-remote-stat-monitoring-via-the: Allow for remote stat monitoring via the monitoring tool
titles.the-guest-will-be-asked-if-they-want-to-: The guest will be asked if they want to reload the previous link when revisiting
titles.guest-will-be-prompted-to-enter-a-displa: All'ospite verrà richiesto di inserire un nome
titles.display-names-will-be-shown-in-the-botto: I nomi visualizzati verranno visualizzati nell'angolo in basso a sinistra dei video
titles.guests-not-actively-speaking-will-be-hid: Gli ospiti che non parlano attivamente saranno nascosti
titles.show-a-custom-welcome-message-to-the-joi: Show a custom welcome message to the joining guest of this invite link
titles.request-1080p60-from-the-guest-instead-o: Richiedi 1080p60 dal Guest invece di 720p60, se possibile
titles.the-default-microphone-will-be-pre-selec: Il microfono predefinito sarà preselezionato per l'ospite
titles.the-default-camera-device-will-selected-: La webcam predefinita verrà selezionata automaticamente
titles.the-camera-will-load-in-a-default-safe-m: The camera will load in a default safe-mode that may work if other modes fail.
titles.the-guest-won-t-have-access-to-changing-: L'ospite non avrà accesso alla modifica delle impostazioni della webcamera o alla condivisione dello schermo
titles.allow-the-guests-to-pick-a-virtual-backs: Allow the guests to pick a virtual backscreen effect
titles.disable-animated-transitions-during-vide: Disable animated transitions during video mixing
titles.this-mode-encodes-the-video-and-audio-in: This mode encodes the video and audio into chunks, which are shared with multiple viewers. Limited browser support. Can potentially reduce CPU and improve video quality, but will rely on a buffer.
titles.increase-video-quality-that-guests-in-ro: Aumenta la qualità del video che gli ospiti in sala vedono.
titles.the-guest-will-not-see-their-own-self-pr: L'ospite non vedrà la propria anteprima personale dopo l'adesione
titles.guests-will-have-an-option-to-poke-the-d: Gli ospiti avranno la possibilità di inviare un poke al Direttore premendo un pulsante
titles.add-an-audio-compressor-to-the-guest-s-m: Aggiungi un compressore audio al microfono dell'ospite
titles.add-an-equalizer-to-the-guest-s-micropho: Add an Equalizer to the guest's microphone that the director can control
titles.show-some-prep-suggestions-to-the-guests: Show some prep suggestions to the guests on connect
titles.have-screen-shares-stream-id-s-use-a-pre: Have screen-shares stream ID's use a predictable prefixed value instead of a random one.
titles.allow-the-guest-to-select-an-avatar-imag: Allow the guest to select an avatar image for when they hide their camera
titles.use-meshcast-servers-to-restream-video-d: Use Meshcast servers to restream video data from this guest to its viewers, reducing the CPU and upload load in some cases. Will increase latency a bit.
titles.the-guest-s-self-video-preview-will-appe: The guest's self-video preview will appear tiny in the top right
titles.show-an-ovelaid-grid-on-the-guest-s-prev: Show an ovelaid grid on the guest's preview video to help with self-centering of the guest.
titles.the-guest-can-only-see-the-director-s-vi: The guest can only see the Director's video, if provided
titles.the-guest-s-microphone-will-be-muted-on-: The guest's microphone will be muted on joining. They can unmute themselves.
titles.have-the-guest-join-muted-so-only-the-di: Disattiva l'audio dell'ospite, in modo che solo il regista possa riattivare l'audio dell'ospite.
titles.the-guest-will-not-be-asked-for-a-video-: All'ospite non verrà richiesto un dispositivo video al momento della connessione.
titles.make-the-invite-url-encoded-so-parameter: Make the invite URL encoded, so parameters are harder to tinker with by guests. This also debrands the interface and gives it a new domain name.
titles.the-active-speakers-are-made-visible-aut: The active speakers are made visible automatically
titles.set-the-background-color-to-bright-green: Set the background color to bright green
titles.videos-use-an-animated-transition-when-b: Videos use an animated transition when being remixed
titles.add-a-10px-margin-around-all-video-eleme: Add a 10px margin around all video elements
titles.disable-fit-to-window-optmized-video-sca: Disable fit-to-window optmized video scaling for added sharpness; increases CPU / Network load though.
titles.playback-the-video-with-mono-channel-aud: Playback the video with mono-channel audio
titles.have-the-videos-fit-their-respective-are: Have the videos fit their respective areas, even if it means cropping a bit
titles.have-videos-be-aligned-with-sizing-desig: Have videos be aligned with sizing designed for vertical video
titles.copy-this-stream-id-to-the-clipboard: Copy this Stream ID to the clipboard
titles.click-here-to-edit-the-label-for-this-st: Click here to edit the label for this stream. Changes will propagate to all viewers of this stream
titles.video-packet-loss-indicator-of-video-pre: Video packet loss indicator of video preview; green is good, red is bad. Flame implies CPU is overloaded. May not reflect the packet loss seen by scenes or other guests.
titles.hold-ctrl-or-cmd-while-clicking-the-vide: Hold CTRL or CMD (⌘) while clicking the video to open detailed stats
titles.remotely-change-the-volume-of-this-guest: Remotely change the volume of this guest; updates on release. Dbl-click to reset.
titles.send-a-direct-message-to-this-user-: Invia un messaggio diretto a questo utente.
titles.toggle-between-the-message-appearing-as-: Toggle between the message appearing as a large overlay and as normal chat
titles.move-the-user-to-another-room-controlled: Sposta l'utente in un'altra stanza, controllata da un altro regista
titles.force-the-user-to-disconnect-they-can-al: Forza l'utente a disconnettersi. Possono sempre riconnettersi.
titles.toggle-solo-voice-chat-or-hold-ctrl-cmd-: Toggle solo voice chat or hold CTRL/CMD when selecting to make it two-way private.
titles.solo-this-video-everywhere-hold-ctrl-cmd: Solo this video everywhere. (Hold CTRL/CMD to just make video larger)
titles.toggle-the-remote-guest-s-display-output: Disattivare l'uscita del display dell'ospite remoto
titles.add-this-video-to-any-remote-scene-1-: Aggiungi questo video a una scena in remoto '&scene=1'
titles.add-this-video-to-any-remote-scene-2-: Add this Video to any remote '&scene=2'

titles.shift-this-video-up-in-order: Sposta questo video in alto nell'ordine
titles.set-a-countdown-timer-that-this-guest-se: Set a countdown timer that this guest sees. CTRL (cmd) + click to pause.
titles.start-recording-this-remote-stream-to-th: Inizia a registrare questo flusso remoto su questa unità locale. *sperimentale*'
titles.the-remote-guest-will-record-their-local: Il Remote Guest registrerà il proprio flusso locale sull'unità locale. *sperimentale*

innerHTML.copy-this-url: Copia questo URL in un OBS "Browser Source"
innerHTML.only-director-can-hear-you: Only the director can hear you currently.
innerHTML.director-video-muted-you: The director has disabled your camera temporarily.
innerHTML.welcome-to-vdo-ninja-chat: Benvenuto in VDO.Ninja! Da qui puoi inviare messaggi di testo direttamente ai peer connessi.
innerHTML.click-here-for-help: Click Here for a quick overview and help
innerHTML.welcome-to-control-room:
Benvenuto. Questa è la sala di controllo per la chat di gruppo. Ci sono diverse cose per cui puoi usare questa stanza:

  • Puoi ospitare una chat di gruppo con gli amici utilizzando una stanza. Condividi il link blu per invitare gli ospiti che si uniranno automaticamente alla chat.
  • Una sala per gruppi può ospitare da 4 a 30 persone, a seconda di numerosi fattori, tra cui CPU e larghezza di banda disponibile di tutti gli ospiti nella stanza.
  • Solo-views of each video are offered under videos as they load. These can be used within an OBS Browser Source.
  • You can use the auto-mixing Group Scene, the green link, to auto arrange multiple videos for you in OBS.
  • You can use this control room to record isolated video or audio streams, but it is an experimental feature still.
  • Videos in the Director's room will be of low quality on purpose; to save bandwidth/CPU
  • Guest's in the room will see each other's videos at a very limited quality to conserve bandwidth/CPU.
  • OBS will see a guest's video in high-quality; the default video bitrate is 2500kbps.

    • As guests join, their videos will appear below. You can bring their video streams into OBS as solo-scenes or you can add them to the Group Scene.
    The Group Scene auto-mixes videos that have been added to the group scene. Please note that the Auto-Mixer requires guests be manually added to it for them to appear in it; they are not added automatically.

    Apple mobile devices, such as iPhones and iPads, do not fully support Video Group Chat. This is a hardware constraint.

    For advanced options and parameters, see the Wiki.
innerHTML.invite-users-to-join: Guests can use the link to join the group room

innerHTML.added-notes:
Aggiungi note:
  • Chiunque può entrare in una stanza se conosce il nome, quindi mantienilo unico
  • Invita solo persone fidate nella stanza.
  • I dispositivi iOS condivideranno solo il loro audio con altri ospiti; questa è principalmente una limitazione hardware
  • Opzione "Registrazione" è considerata opzioneale.

innerHTML.info-blob:
Cosa è VDO.Ninja


  • 100% free; nessun download; nessuna raccolta di dati personali; nessun accesso
  • Porta video dal tuo smartphone, computer o amici direttamente nel tuo flusso video OBS
  • Utilizziamo una tecnologia di inoltro peer-to-peer all'avanguardia che offre privacy e latenza ultra bassa

  • Youtube video Demoing è presente

    • 🛠 For support, see the sub-reddit or join the Discord . The documentation is here and my personal email is steve@seguin.email
innerHTML.join-room-with-mic: Entra nella stanza con il Microfono
innerHTML.join-room-with-camera: Entra nella stanza con la Camera
innerHTML.share-screen-with-room: Condivisione dello schermo con la stanza
innerHTML.click-start-to-join: Fare clic su Start per partecipare
innerHTML.more-than-four-can-join: These four guest slots are just for demonstration. More than four guests can actually join a room.
innerHTML.please-select-option-to-join: Please select an option to join.
innerHTML.note-share-audio:
note: Do not forget to click "Condividi audio" in Chrome.
(Firefox non supporta la condivisione dell'audio..)
innerHTML.click-for-quick-room-overview: ❔ Fare clic qui per una rapida panoramica e assistenza
innerHTML.names-and-labels-coming-soon: I nomi che identificano i peer connessi saranno una funzionalità in una prossima versione..

placeholders.enter-chat-message-to-send-here: Enter chat message to send here
placeholders.enter-a-url-for-the-sidebar-page: Enter a URL for the sidebar page
placeholders.-whip-url-to-publish-to-goes-here: ➡️ WHIP URL to publish to goes here
placeholders.enter-the-remote-obs-password-here: Enter the remote OBS password here
placeholders.give-this-media-source-a-name-optional-: Give this media source a name (optional)

miscellaneous.new-display-name: Enter a new Display Name for this stream
miscellaneous.submit-error-report: Press OK to submit any error logs to VDO.Ninja. Error logs may contain private information.
miscellaneous.director-redirect-1: The director wishes to redirect you to the URL:
miscellaneous.audio-processing-disabled: Audio processing is disabled with this guest. Can't mute or change volume
miscellaneous.not-the-director: <font color='red'>You are not the director of this room.  You will have limited to no control.  You can try claiming the room after the first director leaves.</font>
miscellaneous.room-is-claimed:
The room is already claimed by someone else.

Only the first person to join a room is the assigned director.

Refresh after the first director leaves to claim.
miscellaneous.token-room-is-claimed:
The room is claimed by someone else.

Join as a guest or co-director instead.
miscellaneous.room-is-claimed-codirector:
The room is already claimed by someone else.

Trying to join as a co-director...
miscellaneous.streamid-already-published:
The stream ID you are publishing to is already in use.

Please try with a different invite link or refresh to retry again.

You will now be disconnected.
miscellaneous.room-test-not-good:
The room name 'test' is very commonly used and may not be secure.

Are you sure you wish to proceed?
miscellaneous.load-previous-session: Would you like to load your previous session's settings?
miscellaneous.enter-password:
Please enter the password below: 

(Note: Passwords are case-sensitive and you will not be alerted if it is incorrect.)
miscellaneous.enter-password-2:
Please enter the password below: 

(Note: Passwords are case-sensitive.)
miscellaneous.enter-director-password:
Please enter the director's password:

(Note: Passwords are case-sensitive and you will not be alerted if it is incorrect.)
miscellaneous.password-incorrect:
The password was incorrect.

Refresh and try again.
miscellaneous.enter-new-display-name: Enter a new Display Name for this stream
miscellaneous.what-bitrate: What bitrate would you like to record at? (kbps)
miscellaneous.enter-website: Enter a website URL to share
miscellaneous.press-ok-to-record:
Press OK to start recording. Press again to stop and download.

Warning: Keep this browser tab active to continue recording.

You can change the default video bitrate if desired below (kbps)
miscellaneous.no-streamID-provided:
No streamID was provided; one will be generated randomily.

Stream ID:
miscellaneous.alphanumeric-only:
Info: Only AlphaNumeric characters should be used for the stream ID.

The offending characters have been replaced by an underscore
miscellaneous.stream-id-too-long:
The Stream ID should be less than 45 alPhaNuMeric characters long.

We will trim it to length.
miscellaneous.share-with-trusted: Share only with those you trust
miscellaneous.transfer-guest-to-room:
Transfer guests to room:

(Please note rooms must share the same password)
miscellaneous.transfer-guest-to-url:
Transfer guests to new website URL.

(Guests will be prompted to accept)
miscellaneous.confirm-disconnect-users: Are you sure you wish to disconnect these users?
miscellaneous.confirm-disconnect-user: Are you sure you wish to disconnect this user?
miscellaneous.enter-new-codirector-password: Enter a co-director password to use
miscellaneous.volume-control: Volume control for local playback only
miscellaneous.signal-meter: Video packet loss indicator of video preview; green is good, red is bad. Flame implies CPU is overloaded. May not reflect the packet loss seen by scenes or other guests.
miscellaneous.waiting-for-the-stream: Waiting for the stream. Tip: Adding &cleanoutput to the URL will hide this spinner, or click to retry, which will also hide it.
miscellaneous.you-have-been-transferred: You've been transferred to a different room
miscellaneous.you-have-been-activated: The director has allowed you to see others in the room now
miscellaneous.you-are-no-longer-a-co-director: You are no longer a co-director as you were transferred.
miscellaneous.headphones-tip: Tip: Use headphones to avoid audio echo issues.
miscellaneous.camera-tip-c922: Tip: To achieve 60-fps with a C922 webcam, low-light compensation needs to be turned off, exposure set to auto, and 720p used.
miscellaneous.camera-tip-camlink: Tip: A Cam Link may glitch green/purple if accessed elsewhere while already in use.
miscellaneous.samsung-a-series: Samsung A-series phones may have issues with Chrome; if so, try Firefox Mobile instead or switch video codecs.
miscellaneous.screen-permissions-denied:
Permission to capture denied. Ensure your browser has screen record system permissions

1.On your Mac, choose Apple menu  > System Preferences, click Security & Privacy , then click Privacy.
2.Select Screen Recording.
3.Select the checkbox next to your browser to allow it to record your screen.
miscellaneous.change-audio-output-device:
Audio could not be captured. Please make sure you have an audio output device available.

Some gaming headsets (ie: Corsair) may need to be set to 2-channel output to work, as surround sound drivers may cause problems.
miscellaneous.prompt-access-request: is trying to view your stream. Allow them?
miscellaneous.confirm-reload-user: Are you sure you wish to reload this user's browser?
miscellaneous.webrtc-is-blocked:
⚠ This browser has either blocked WebRTC or does not support it.

This site will not work without it.

Disable any browser extensions or privacy settings that may be blocking WebRTC, or try a different browser.
miscellaneous.not-clean-session:
Video effects or canvas rendering failed.

Check to ensure any remotely hosted images are cross-origin allowed.
miscellaneous.ios-no-screen-share: Sorry, but your iOS browser does not support screen-sharing. Please see this guide for an alternative method to do so.
miscellaneous.android-no-screen-share: Sorry, your mobile browser does not support screen-sharing. The Android native app does offer basic support for it though.
miscellaneous.no-screen-share-supported:
Sorry, your browser does not support screen-sharing.

Please use the desktop versions of Firefox or Chrome instead.
miscellaneous.speech-not-suppoted: ⚠ Speech Recognition is not supported by this browser
miscellaneous.blue-yeti-tip: Tip: Blue Yeti microphones may experience issues being overly loud. Please see here for a solution or disable auto-gain in VDO.Ninja.
miscellaneous.site-not-responsive:
Notice: The system cannot be accessed or is currently slow to respond.

If a routing issue, try adding &proxy to the URL; you can also try https://proxy.vdo.ninja or a VPN if the service is blocked in your country. If the main service is down, a backup version is also available here: https://backup.vdo.ninja Contact steve@seguin.email for added help. This service requires the use of Websockets over port 443.
miscellaneous.no-audio-source-detected:
No Audio Source was detected.

If you were wanting to capture an Application's Audio, please see:
https://docs.vdo.ninja/help/guides-and-how-tos#audio for some guides.
miscellaneous.viewer-count: Total outbound p2p connections of this remote stream
miscellaneous.enter-url-for-widget: Enter a URL for a page to embed as a sidebar
miscellaneous.vision-disabled: The Director has disabled your vision temporarily
miscellaneous.invalid-remote-code:
Invalid remote control code.

Use the field below to try again with a different passcode.
miscellaneous.invalid-remote-code-obs:
Invalid remote control code.

The remote OBS system needs a matching passcode set using &remote.

See the documentation for help..
miscellaneous.request-rejected-obs:
The request was rejected.

The remote OBS system needs a matching passcode set using &remote.

See the documentation for help.
miscellaneous.remote-token-rejected: The remote request failed; the &remote token did not match or the remote user does not allow remote control.
miscellaneous.remote-peer-connected:
Remote peer connected to video stream.

Connection to handshake server being killed on request. This increases security, but the peer will not be able to reconnect automatically on connection failure.

Press OK to start the stream!
miscellaneous.director-denied: The main director denied you as a co-director
miscellaneous.only-main-director: Only the main director can transfer this guest
miscellaneous.request-failed: The request failed; you can't apply this action
miscellaneous.tokens-did-not-match: The remote request failed; the remote token did not match or the remote user does not allow remote control.
miscellaneous.token-not-director: The request failed; the remote user did not recognize you as the director
miscellaneous.approved-as-director: The director approved you as a co-director
miscellaneous.you-are-a-codirector: You are a co-director of this room; you have partial director control assigned to you.
miscellaneous.this-is-you:
This is you, a co-director.
You are also a performer.
miscellaneous.preview-meshcast-disabled: You can't adjust the preview bitrate for Meshcast-based streams
miscellaneous.you-not-yet-activated: Please wait until the director brings you into the room
miscellaneous.sample-rate-too-high: Your audio playback device has its sample rate set very high. If having audio issues, try using 48-kHz instead.
miscellaneous.no-network-details:
Network connection lost. 🤷‍♀️❌📶

Have you lost your Internet connection?
miscellaneous.enter-password-if-desired: Enter a password if provided, otherwise just click Cancel
